body.p: Data Managers issue Data Frame read/write requests (ReadReq/WriteReq) to the Mapping Managers in a round-robin fashion. It is desirable for the Data Managers to skip a Mapping Manager if its inbound IPC port is full. Each Data Manager is initialized to start with a different Mapping Manager; that is, Data Manager 0 uses Mapping Manager 0 and Data Manager 1 uses Mapping Manager 1, etc.
